job_tasks.justification: The job title itself indicates a focus on developing software using the OutSystems platform.
This phrase directly refers to OutSystems as a platform for software development.

classification.rationale: The job description primarily focuses on the OutSystems low-code platform, which is a development tool but not directly tied to AI or machine learning tasks. There is no mention of AI-specific technologies, models, or tasks, making it fall outside the scope of the defined GenAI Engineer profile.
